ProductInfo.Features:
Image Sensor: 1/3 Sony CCD. Night Vision Dome IR Video Security Camera, With 48 Pcs IR LEDs, The Viewing Range Can Achieve to Be 25 Meters In The Night Time.
Horizontal Resolution: 420 TV Lines. The Length of The Lens: 4 mm. Switching Between Day & Night Vision Is Completely Automatic.
Adopt Low Power Consumption Board, with Stable Performance. Lens and Infrared Led Complete Isolation. Resolve The Fog and Astigmatism Phenomenon Effectively.
Material:Plastic. IR Lamps Wavelength: 850nm. Minimum Illumination: 0.000 LUX x F1.2(IR LED ON).
Security Dome Camera Applicable Scope: House, Hotel, Government, Various Indoor Environment.
ProductInfo.Name: BW® 4 Pack ,1/3 Inch Sony CCD IR Night Vision Dome CCTV Security Camera with 48 Pcs IR LEDs, 420 TV Lines, 4mm Lens, Night vision function, Indoor Home / Business Security Video Surveillance Used
